mapper.select: SELECT A.MEMBER_NAME, A.MEMBER_ID, A.MEMBER_EMAIL, A.MEMBER_PASSWORD, B.COMPANYNAME, B.DEPARTMENT, B.MYPOSITION, B.COMPANYCALLNUMBER, B.PROFILEIMG FROM MEMBERINFO A LEFT OUTER JOIN USERSETTING B ON A.MEMBER_ID = B.MEMBER_ID WHERE B.MEMBER_ID=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE USERSETTING SET PROFILEIMG = #{profileFileName} WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{id}
